translations.english_saheeh: By the night when it covers[1937]
translations.english_hilali_khan: By the night as it envelops.
translations.english_rwwad: By the night when it covers,

translations.english_saheeh: And [by] the day when it appears
translations.english_hilali_khan: By the day as it appears in brightness.
translations.english_rwwad: and by the day when it appears,

phonetic: 92.3 Wa Mā Khalaqa Adh-Dhakara Wa Al-'Unthá

translations.english_saheeh: And [by] He who created the male and female,
translations.english_hilali_khan: By Him Who created male and female.
translations.english_rwwad: and by His creation of male and female,

translations.english_saheeh: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Certainly, your efforts and deeds are diverse (different in aims and purposes);
translations.english_rwwad: surely your efforts are divergent.

translations.english_saheeh: As for he who gives and fears Allāh
translations.english_hilali_khan: As for him who gives (in charity) and keeps his duty to Allâh and fears Him,
translations.english_rwwad: As for the one who gives in charity and fears Allah,

footnotes.english_hilali_khan:
(V.92:6)
(A) Al-Husnâ: The Best (i.e. either Lâ ilâha illallâh none has the right to be worshipped but Allâh) or a reward from Allâh (i.e. Allâh will compensate him for what he will spend in Allâh’s Way or bless him with Paradise).
(B) See the footnote of (V.4:37).

translations.english_saheeh: And believes in the best [reward],
translations.english_hilali_khan: And believes in Al-Husnâ.[1]
translations.english_rwwad: and truly believes in the best reward,

translations.english_saheeh: We will ease him toward ease.
translations.english_hilali_khan: We will make smooth for him the path of ease (goodness).
translations.english_rwwad: We will make easy for him the way of salvation.

footnotes.english_hilali_khan: (V.92:8) Narrated ‘Alî رضي الله عنه : We were in the company of the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم and he said, "There is none among you but has his place written for him, either in Paradise or in the Hell-fire." We said, "O Allâh’s Messenger! Shall we depend (on this fact and give up work)?" He replied, "No! Carry on doing good deeds, for everybody will find easy (to do) such deeds as will lead him to his destined place." Then the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم recited: "As for him who gives (in charity) and keeps his duty to Allâh and fears Him, and believes in Al-Husnâ. We will make smooth for him the path of ease..." (V.92: 5-10) (Sahih Al-Bukhari, Vol.6, Hadith No.472).

translations.english_saheeh: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
translations.english_hilali_khan: But he who is greedy miser and thinks himself self-sufficient.[2]
translations.english_rwwad: But as for the one who is miserly and deems himself self-sufficient,

translations.english_saheeh: And denies the best [reward],
translations.english_hilali_khan: And belies Al-Husnâ (See the footnote of the Verse No.6)
translations.english_rwwad: and denies the best reward,

translations.english_saheeh: We will ease him toward difficulty.
translations.english_hilali_khan: We will make smooth for him the path for evil.
translations.english_rwwad: We will make easy for him the way of perdition.

arabic_text: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1938]- i.e., when he dies or is destroyed. It can also mean when he falls into the Hellfire.

translations.english_saheeh: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?[1938]
translations.english_hilali_khan: And what will his wealth avail him when he goes down (in destruction)?.
translations.english_rwwad: His wealth will be of no avail to him when he tumbles [into Hell].

translations.english_saheeh: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Truly! On Us is (to give) guidance.
translations.english_rwwad: Indeed, it is upon Us to show the right way,

translations.english_saheeh: And indeed, to us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
translations.english_hilali_khan: And truly, unto Us (belong) the last (Hereafter) and the first (this world).
translations.english_rwwad: and surely to Us belong the Hereafter and the present life.

translations.english_saheeh: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Therefore I have warned you of a blazing Fire (Hell).
translations.english_rwwad: So I warn you of a raging Fire,

translations.english_saheeh: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one
translations.english_hilali_khan: None shall enter it save the most wretched.
translations.english_rwwad: none will enter it except the most wretched,

translations.english_saheeh: Who had denied and turned away.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Who denies and turns away.
translations.english_rwwad: who denied and turned away.

translations.english_saheeh: But the righteous one will avoid it
translations.english_hilali_khan: will be far removed from it (Hell).
translations.english_rwwad: But the most righteous will be saved from it,

translations.english_saheeh: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
translations.english_hilali_khan: He who spends his wealth for increase in self-purification,
translations.english_rwwad: who spends his wealth to purify himself,

arabic_text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ
phonetic: 92.19 Wa Mā Li'ĥadin `Indahu Min Ni`matin Tujzá

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1939]- i.e., without intending reciprocation for some benefit to himself.

translations.english_saheeh: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded[1939]
translations.english_hilali_khan: And who has (in mind) no favour from anyone to be paid back,
translations.english_rwwad: not in return for someone’s favors,

translations.english_saheeh: But only seeking the face [i.e., acceptance] of his Lord, Most High.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Except to seek the Countenance of his Lord, the Most High.
translations.english_rwwad: but to seek the pleasure of his Lord, the Most High.

translations.english_saheeh: And he is going to be satisfied.
translations.english_hilali_khan: He surely will be pleased (when he enters Paradise).
translations.english_rwwad: He will surely be well pleased.
